children.name: gps
children.hint: Capture the geocode before entering the facility building.
children.label: Geocode of Facility

children.name: code_available
children.label: Do you have a school code issued by the Ministry of Education?

children.name: code
children.hint: Note: This should be the same code issued by the Ministry of Education and used in the census of schools.
children.label: School Code

children.name: level_of_education
children.label: What level of education does this school offer?

children.name: primary_js_ss
children.label: Primary, junior secondary, and senior secondary schools

children.name: js_ss
children.label: Junior secondary and senior secondary schools

children.name: education_type
children.label: What type of education does the school offer?

children.name: private_school_recognition
children.label: What is the status of school recognition?

children.name: all_weather_road_access
children.label: Can the road to the school be used all the time, even during the rainy season?

children.name: days_inaccessible
children.label: How many days in the last month were people not able to reach the school because the main road/route could not be used?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: attendance_when_inaccessible
children.label: Were most students able to come to school even when the main/regular route to the school was not accessible?

children.name: distance_to_catchment_area
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than 1 km.
children.label: How far is the school, in kilometers, from the areas it serves (catchment area)?

children.name: distance_to_secondary_school
children.hint: Enter 0 id within 1 km or 9999 if you are a secondary school.
children.label: What is the distance to the nearest secondary school in kilometers?

children.name: daily_public_transport
children.label: Is there daily public transport from this primary school to where nearest the secondary school is located?

children.name: num_students_beyond_3km
children.hint: Please enter the number of students. If none, then enter 0.
children.label: Please estimate the number of students who live further than 3 km from the school.

children.name: power_sources_available
children.label: What power sources are available at this school?

children.name: functional
children.label: Is the Generator connected and functional?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: The last time the Generator broke, how long did it take to fix it?

children.name: months_broken
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than one month
children.label: Please specify how long ago the Generator broke down (IN MONTHS)

children.name: functional
children.label: Is the Solar system connected and functional?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: The last time the Solar system broke, how long did it take to fix it?

children.name: months_broken
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than one month
children.label: Please specify how long ago the Solar system broke down (IN MONTHS)

children.name: functional
children.label: Is the Grid connection/power/PHCN/NEPA connected and functional?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: The last time the Grid connection/power/PHCN/NEPA broke, how long did it take to fix it?

children.name: months_broken
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than one month
children.label: Please specify how long ago the Grid connection/power/PHCN/NEPA broke down (IN MONTHS)

children.name: days_no_electricity
children.hint: Enter 0 if the school always had electricity/power.
children.label: How many days in past month was the school with no electricity/power from any source?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: water_sources_available
children.label: What IMPROVED water sources are on the premises or less than 100 meters away?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: The last time the Pipe water stopped working or broke how long did it take to repair?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: The last time the Borehole/tubewell stopped working or broke how long did it take to repair?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: The last time the Protected well stopped working or broke how long did it take to repair?

children.name: days_no_water
children.hint: Please enter 0 if water was always available
children.label: How many days in the past month was the school without water from any of the sources you have indicated as available?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: days_no_potable_water
children.hint: Please enter 0 if potable water was always available
children.label: How many days in the past month was the school without POTABLE water from any of the sources you have indicated as available?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: instructions_physical_structure
children.label: Note: Do not ask the next question aloud. Respond to the question based on your own observation of the school buildings.

children.name: physical_structure
children.label: How would you describe how a majority of the school buildings look?

children.name: nomadic_school_structure
children.label: Is the school a temporary structure for nomadic schools?

children.name: available_toilet_types
children.label: What type of toilets are on the premises?

children.name: flush_destination
children.label: Where do the flush or pour flush toilets drain to?

children.name: improved
children.label: Piped water system, septic tank, or pit latrine

children.name: unimproved
children.label: Street, yard/compound, open sewer, a ditch, a drainage way or other location

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Flush or pour flush on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Flush or pour flush are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Flush or pour flush toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Ventilated improved pit latrine (VIP) on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Ventilated improved pit latrine (VIP) are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Ventilated improved pit latrine (VIP) toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Pit latrine with slab on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Pit latrine with slab are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Pit latrine with slab toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Pit latrine without slab/open pit on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Pit latrine without slab/open pit are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Pit latrine without slab/open pit toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Bucket system on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Bucket system are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Bucket system toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Other on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Other are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Other toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: toilets_separated_by_gender
children.label: Are there separate toilets for males and females?

children.name: times_building_cleaned
children.label: How many days in the last month were school buildings swept/cleaned?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: days_trash_disposed
children.label: How many days in the last month was rubbish or waste collected or burned or appropriately disposed?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.label: At least one mobile phone owned by the school (not a private number owned by a staff member)

children.type: number of days in last month

children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: teachers_on_time
children.label: In your view, do teachers usually arrive to school on time?

children.name: teacher_attendance_training

children.label: How many students was the school built to hold (school capacity)?

children.name: multigrade_teaching

children.hint: This must equal the sum of male and female students from the previous two questions.
children.label: What is the total number of students enrolled during the current school year?
